---
title: mysql查询重复的_mysql查询重复数据
categories: 
tags: mysql查询重复的
---
表全部数据

![49dc4390bb6e96c7c90fb01bb1d130b3.png](data:image/png;base64,)

\-------------------

1 查询people_no重复的记录

select * from people

where people_no in (select people_no from people group by people_no having
count(people_no) > 1);

![345d1954423fb49a57a3ab45ba00933c.png](data:image/png;base64,)

\----------------------

2 查询people_no重复的记录 ，排除最小id，如果删除改为delete from

select * from people

where people_no in (select people_no from people group by people_no having
count(people_no) > 1) and

id not in (select min(id) from people group by people_no having
count(people_no)>1);
